entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:39 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:39 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:39 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
